009package Ch26_MserFeatures;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.ImageStack;
015import ij.gui.Roi;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019
020/**
021 * Select a horizontal line!
022 * TODO: add JavaDoc
023 * @author WB (2021)
024 *
025 */
026public class Show_Threshold_Projection implements PlugInFilter {
027        
028        static Color colorBelow = new Color(255, 252, 139);   //(200, 200, 200);
029        static Color colorAbove = Color.white;
030        static Color colorWaterDark = Color.blue;
031        static Color colorWaterBright = new Color(200, 200, 255);
032        
033        static int threshold = 100;
034        
035        private ImagePlus im;
036        
037        @Override
038        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
039                this.im = im;
040                return DOES_8G + ROI_REQUIRED; // | NO_CHANGES;
041        }
042        
043        @Override
044        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
045                
046                Roi roi = im.getRoi();
047                int y = roi.getBounds().y;
048                
049                int width = ip.getWidth();
050                
051                // selected pixel line
052                int[] hline = new int[width];   
053                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
054                        hline[u] = ip.get(u, y);
055                }
056                
057                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(width, 256);
058                
059                for (int threshold = 0; threshold < 256; threshold++) {
060                        ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(width, 256);
061                        cp.setColor(colorAbove);
062                        cp.fill();
063                        
064                        // fill with water
065                        //cp.setColor(colorWaterDark);
066                        for (int v = 0; v <= threshold; v++) {
067                                cp.setColor((v % 2 == 0) ? colorWaterBright : colorWaterDark);
068                                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
069                                        cp.drawPixel(u, v);
070                                }
071                        }
072                        
073                        // fill underneath brightness surface
074                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
075                                for (int v = 0; v < hline[u]; v++) {
076                                        cp.setColor(colorBelow);
077                                        cp.drawPixel(u, v);
078                                }
079                        }
080                        
081                        // draw horizontal lines
082                        cp.setColor(Color.black);
083                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
084                                cp.drawPixel(u, hline[u]);
085                        }
086                        
087                        cp.setColor(Color.black);
088                        // draw vertical lines
089                        for (int u = 0; u < width - 1; u++) {
090                                if (hline[u] > hline[u + 1]) {
091                                        for (int v = hline[u]; v >= hline[u + 1]; v--) {
092                                                cp.drawPixel(u, v);
093                                        }
094                                }
095                                if (hline[u] < hline[u + 1]) {
096                                        for (int v = hline[u]; v <= hline[u + 1]; v++) {
097                                                cp.drawPixel(u + 1, v);
098                                        }
099                                }
100                        }
101                        
102                        cp.flipVertical();
103                        stack.addSlice("threshold="+threshold, cp);
104                        
105                        
106                }
107
108                new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle()+ "-threshold-" + threshold, stack).show();
109
110        }
111        
112}
